summary: This is a docket activity notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding the case United States v. Maxwell. It indicates that an appendix (Volume 1 of 2) was filed on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell on September 24, 2020, as part of her appeal.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant/appellant in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell, for whom an appendix was filed with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

persons.name: Gerard Whidbee
persons.context: A deputy clerk at the Second Circuit Court of Appeals who is listed to receive electronic notice of the docket activity.

connections.description: Adversarial legal relationship as defendant and prosecuting government in the case United States v. Maxwell.

events.title: Filing of Appeal Appendix
events.description: An appendix (Volume 1 of 2) was filed electronically with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell in case 20-3061.

keyFacts: The document is a docket notice for the appellate case United States v. Maxwell, case number 20-3061.
An appendix (Volume 1 of 2, pages 1-123) was filed on September 24, 2020, on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell.
The notice is from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals and includes standard PACER access fee information.
The filing is part of Ghislaine Maxwell's appeal process following her criminal conviction.
